explanation: [0-0] In a yard, a boy wearing a red T-shirt peeks his head out from behind a white wall. The background of the yard is an old wall made of white and brown bricks, with a piece of flooring standing upright against it.

[0-3] Another little boy, also wearing a red T-shirt, appears next to the boy, and they curiously poke their heads out to look ahead. The scene changes to a woman milking a cow by the grass, wearing a pink T-shirt and a pink headscarf. The camera cuts to the two boys turning and walking away.

[3-7] Then, the two boys walk to a white wall and pick up two silver cups. The camera cuts to the two boys running out from behind the white wall with the cups in their hands.
